lines.d: The boy looks in the bathroom mirror in his pajamas, with unkempt hair and a pair of glasses on the counter. He looks kinda gross.
He runs his hand through his hair, causing it to become smooth almost magically. He confidently sets his glasses on his face.

content.html:
If only it were really this easy.

“But Gabe!” you might be thinking, “JoeRunner doesn’t have a nose! How does he put on his glasses?” And you’re right. And I promise that the other characters have noses.

Some of them. Some of the other characters have noses.
